game_info.title: Cloud Hero
game_info.description: Issues have occurred in the cloud world! The power of a hero is needed!

questions.scenario: You have arrived at the front of the village! What is the name of this service that runs servers in the cloud?
questions.explanation: Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud) is a web service that provides scalable computing capacity in the cloud.

questions.scenario: Deep in the EC2 mine, instances are running wild. The instances are shouting 'Out of memory: kill process xxxxx!' and running around frantically. What choice should you make?
choices: Stop the instance, select a larger instance type, and restart
questions.explanation: When out of memory errors occur, you should stop the instance and change to a larger instance type to increase memory.

questions.scenario: Important data has been accidentally deleted from the S3 treasure vault! The villagers are crying. What's the way to recover the data?
choices: If versioning is enabled, restore the previous version
questions.explanation: If S3 versioning is enabled, you can restore previous versions of deleted objects.

questions.scenario: In the Lambda wizard's tower, a function has been running for over 15 minutes. The wizard shouts 'Timeout!' What is Lambda's maximum execution time?
questions.explanation: The maximum execution time (timeout) for AWS Lambda functions is 15 minutes.

questions.scenario: The connection to the RDS database castle was suddenly lost! The lord laments, 'We should have done Multi-AZ deployment...' What is the main purpose of Multi-AZ deployment?
questions.explanation: RDS Multi-AZ deployment provides high availability and automatically performs failover to a standby instance when the primary DB instance fails.

questions.scenario: The CloudFront messenger station updated the website, but users are still seeing the old version! The station master shouts 'The cache is the problem!' What's the most appropriate solution?
questions.explanation: To immediately update cached content in CloudFront, you can use cache invalidation to forcibly remove the cache for specific files or paths.

questions.scenario: At the IAM security office, permissions must be granted to a new developer. The sheriff emphasizes 'We must follow the principle of least privilege!' What's the correct approach?
choices: Grant only the minimum permissions needed
questions.explanation: According to the IAM principle of least privilege, users should have only the minimum permissions necessary to perform their tasks.

questions.scenario: Traffic has surged at the Auto Scaling training ground! The instructor shouts 'Scale out is needed!' What does scale out mean?
questions.explanation: Scale out is horizontal scaling, which means adding more instances to distribute the load.

questions.scenario: At the security group fortress, you're trying to connect to a web server but can't connect! The guard captain shouts 'Port 80 is blocked!' How do you allow HTTP traffic?
choices: Allow port 80 (HTTP) from 0.0.0.0/0 in inbound rules
questions.explanation: To allow HTTP access to a web server, you need to add port 80 to the security group's inbound rules. 0.0.0.0/0 allows access from all IPs.

questions.scenario: All adventures are over and the hero wants to move to the next world! But the Bedrock AI magic circle that opens the dimensional gate is not working, showing 'AccessDeniedException' error. The wizard shouts 'No model access permission!' What's the solution?
choices: Request access to the Foundation Model you want to use in the Bedrock console
questions.explanation: When AccessDeniedException occurs in Bedrock, you must first request access to the Foundation Model you want to use in the AWS Bedrock console.

success: and opened the door to the next world!
